content:
Hey! One of the biggest problems with rust-analyzer is that:

  • there's a ton of design work to do
  • only few people do this work.

I'd like to parallelize design more, and, as an experiment, I am creating an E-Mentor issue to not only implement, but also design a piece of infrastructure (for desugaring): https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/issues/2236.

Thought some of you folks might be interested!
